propertySets.label: Software Properties
propertySets.description: Software properties of ocean code

properties.label: Repository
properties.description: Location of code for this component.

properties.label: Code Version
properties.description: Code version identifier.

properties.label: Code Languages
properties.description: Code language(s).

properties.label: Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

properties.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
properties.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

properties.label: Number Of Vertical Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels resolved on computational grid.

properties.label: Is Adaptive Grid
properties.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

properties.label: Thickness Level 1
properties.description: Thickness of first surface ocean level (in meters)

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics of mean state (e.g THC, AABW, regional means etc) used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: Brief description of conservation methodology

properties.label: Scheme
properties.description: Properties conserved in the ocean by the numerical schemes

enum.label: Conservation Props Types
enum.description: List of properties that can be conserved in ocean

properties.label: Consistency Properties
properties.description: Any additional consistency properties (energy conversion, pressure gradient discretisation, ...)?

properties.label: Corrected Conserved Prognostic Variables
properties.description: Set of variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.

properties.label: Was Flux Correction Used
properties.description: Does conservation involved flux correction ?
